itemDescription: British Army officer and Conservative Party politician

wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Charles Ash Windham (10 October 1810 – 2 February 1870) was a British Army officer and Liberal Party politician.

response: * The Redan public house on Thorpe Road in Norwich was originally named The Hero of the Redan, in reference to Major-General Charles Ashe Windham
* Mansfield, H.O., Charles Ashe Windham: A Norfolk Soldier (1810-1870)
